recipes.cooking_method: Cook pasta according to package instructions. While pasta is cooking, combine basil, Parmesan cheese, olive oil, and garlic in a food processor and blend until smooth. Drain pasta and toss with pesto sauce. Serve immediately.

Gather all ingredients.Combine water, rice vinegar, lemon juice, soy sauce, and orange juice for sauce into a saucepan over medium-high heat. Stir in brown sugar, green onion, orange zest, ginger, garlic, and pepper flakes; bring to a boil. Remove from heat, and cool for 10 to 15 minutes.

ingredients: pound beef sirloin, cut into 2-inch strips
1 red bell pepper, cut into matchsticks
recipes.cooking_method: Gather all ingredients.Heat vegetable oil in a large wok or skillet over medium-high heat; cook and stir beef until browned, 3 to 4 minutes.Stir beef into vegetables and season with soy sauce and sesame seeds. Continue to cook and stir until vegetables are tender, about 2 more minutes.

1. Cook egg noodles according to package instructions. 
2. In a separate pan, cook beef sirloin until fully cooked. 
3. In the same pan, sauté diced onion and sliced mushrooms. 
4. Add beef broth to the pan and bring to a simmer. 
5. Reduce heat and stir in sour cream until fully mixed. 
6. Serve beef mixture over cooked egg noodles.

Prepare dipping sauce: Combine soy sauce, rice vinegar, chives, sesame seeds, and chile sauce in a small bowl. Set aside.Place a dumpling wrapper on a lightly floured work surface and spoon about 1 tablespoon of the filling in the middle.

Mix together hoisin sauce, ketchup, honey, soy sauce, sake, rice vinegar, lemon juice, ginger, garlic, and five-spice powder in a shallow glass dish. Place ribs in the dish and turn to coat. Cover and marinate in the refrigerator for 2 hours or up to overnight

Prepare sauce: Heat vegetable oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).Whisk egg in large mixing bowl. Add chicken, salt, sugar, and pepper; mix well. Mix in cornstarch, a little bit at a time, until chicken is well coated.

ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into small pieces
recipes.cooking_method: In a large pan, heat the vegetable oil over high heat. Add the chicken and cook for 3-4 minutes or until browned, cornstarch. Pour the sauce over the chicken and vegetables and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. Serve hot over rice.

ingredients: 1 large head broccoli, cut into florets
recipes.cooking_method: In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, oyster sauce, and cornstarch. Set aside. Heat the vegetable oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat. Add the sliced beef and  an additional 1-2 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. Serve hot over rice.
In a large pot, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add the garlicSet aside. Heat the vegetable oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat

Prepare dipping sauce: Combine soy sauce, rice vinegar, chives, sesame seeds, and chile sauce in a small bowl. Set aside.Place a dumpling wrapper on a lightly floured work surface and spoon about 1 tablespoon of the filling in the middle.

Gather all ingredients.Combine water, rice vinegar, lemon juice, soy sauce, and orange juice for sauce into a saucepan over medium-high heat. Stir in brown sugar, green onion, orange zest, ginger, garlic, and pepper flakes; bring to a boil. Remove from heat, and cool for 10 to 15 minutes.

ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
recipes.cooking_method: Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat. Add garlic, ginger, Szechuan peppercorns, and dried red chilies and stir-fry for 30 seconds. Add shrimp and stir-fry until they turn pink. Add soy sauce, rice vinegar, and sugar and stir-fry for another 30 seconds. Serve hot.

Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat. Add ginger and garlic and stir-fry for 30 seconds. Add tofu,   vegetables are tender. Mix cornstarch with a little bit of water and add to the pan. Stir-fry for another 30 seconds until the sauce thickens. Serve with peanuts on top.

In a large saucepan, bring the chicken broth, bamboo shoots, and mushrooms to a boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Add rice vinegar, soy sauce, sesame oil, and white pepper and simmer for another 5 minutes. Mix
